notes.whisper_python: Path to Python with Whisper installed. Leave empty to use system Python or set WHISPER_PYTHON env var.
notes.whisper_script: Path to whisper_to_json.py script. Leave empty to use built-in transcription.
notes.use_native_resolve_ai: If true, prefer DaVinci Resolve's built-in Neural Engine for transcription (requires Studio version).
